analyzed: nang stong pa nyid des rlom sems su mi bya'o //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes par bya ste /

translated: but one should not become conceited on account of them.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shes par bya ste /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shes par bya ste /

analyzed: de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //

translated: “They should understand the four right efforts, the four legs of supernatural power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path,

original: de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not become proud on account of them.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes par bya ste /
translated: “They should understand the four noble truths, the eight deliverances, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the meditative stabilities, and the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //
translated: but they should not become proud on account of them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya ste /
translated: “They should understand the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

analyzed: de dag gis rlom sems su mi bya'o //

analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bya'o //

analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o; ;rlabs po che'i sems kyis rlom sems su mi bya'o //

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de ltar sems de sems ma yin te /

analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin /
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin /

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: che dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: che dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: sems gang 'dod chags dang yang mi ldan ma bral /

original: zhe sdang dang; gti mug dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / sgrib pa dang / gcod pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang yang mi ldan ma bral ba 'di ni /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang; gti mug dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / sgrib pa dang / gcod pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang yang mi ldan ma bral ba 'di ni /
translated: or the thoughts of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāradvatīputra then asked,

original: sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba de yod dam /
analyzed: sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba de yod dam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, is there a mind that is not a mind?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: de ltar sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa dmigs pa'am yod par 'gyur ram /

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāradvatīputra replied,

original: de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin no //
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, it is not.”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti then said,🔽“Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gal te de ltar sems ma @169b yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar sems ma @169b yin pa de la yod pa'am med pa zhes bya ba med cing mi dmigs na /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: khyod kyis de skad du sems gang la sems ma yin pa zhes bya ba de yod dam zhes phyir dris pa de 'thad par 'gyur ram /

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Śāradvatīputra replied, “Venerable Subhūti,

original: sems ma yin pa gang yin /
analyzed: sems ma yin pa gang yin /
translated: what is the nonexistence of mind?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: sems ma yin pa ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
analyzed: sems ma yin pa ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
translated: the nonexistence of mind is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de /
translated: It is the suchness of all phenomena.

original: de la ni sems med pa /
analyzed: de la ni sems med pa /
translated: In it there is no mind.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called ‘inconceivable.’🔽” Śāradvatīputra asked,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Just as the mind is without change and without conceptualization, is form also without change and without conceptualization?

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang; rnam par shes pa la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang; rnam par shes pa la yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness also unchanging and nonconceptual, just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Are the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind also unchanging and nonconceptual, just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual?🔽Are the form, sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects also unchanging and nonconceptual, just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du mig gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du mig gi khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /🔽gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: Are the eye constituent, form constituent, and eye consciousness constituent also unchanging and nonconceptual, just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam pa shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i @170a *//

translated: the ear element, the sound element, and the ear consciousness element; the nose element, the smell element, and the nose consciousness element; the tongue element, the taste element, and the tongue consciousness element;

original: khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang; chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang; chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: the ear element, the sound element, and the ear consciousness element; the nose element, the smell element, and the nose consciousness element; the tongue element, the taste element, and the tongue consciousness element; the body element, the tangible-object element, and the body consciousness element; the thinking-mind element, the dharma element, and the thinking-mind consciousness element?

original: skye mched dang / phung po dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang /

translated: “Are the sense bases, the aggregates, the elements, dependent origination, the perfections, all the emptinesses, the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts,

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang; rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
translated: the bases of supernatural powers, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the noble truths, the dhyānas, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /

translated: the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the higher knowledges, the meditative stabilities, and the dhāraṇī gateways, are they without change and without conceptualization?

analyzed: byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: the great love, the great compassion, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are also unchanging and nonconceptual?

original: rnam pa @170b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa @170b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam /
translated: up to and the knowledge of all aspects are also unchanging and nonconceptual?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is so, it is so.

original: ji ltar sems la 'gyur pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar sems la 'gyur pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the mind is unchanging and nonconceptual,

original: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched drug dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched drug dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang; byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /
translated: the aggregates, the elements, the six sense fields, dependent origination, the perfections, all the emptinesses, the dharmas on the side of awakening, the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the meditative stabilizations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
translated: wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, great love, great compassion, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses,🔽and

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do //
translated: up to and including the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, and the knowledge of all aspects, is unchanging and nonconceptual.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so //🔽zhes bya ba byin te /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so // zhes bya ba byin te /

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

original: legs so // legs so //
analyzed: legs so // legs so //
translated: Excellent, Subhūti!

original: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa; @171a *//
analyzed: khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa; @171a *//

original: zhal nas byung ba /
analyzed: zhal nas byung ba /

original: chos las skyes pa /
analyzed: chos las skyes pa /

original: chos kyi sprul pa /
analyzed: chos kyi sprul pa /

original: chos kyi bgo skal pa /
analyzed: chos kyi bgo skal pa /

original: zang zing gi bgo skal ba ma yin pa /
analyzed: zang zing gi bgo skal ba ma yin pa /

original: chos rnams la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos rnams la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa /

original: lus mngon du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: lus mngon du gyur pa ste /

original: nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu /
analyzed: nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rnams kyi mchog tu /
translated: the best of the hearers who practice without afflictions,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /

original: bstan pa 'di'ang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di'ang de'i tshul dang 'dra'o //

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /

translated: bodhisattva mahāsattvas should also train in the perfection of wisdom in that way.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'ang 'di las yongs su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'ang 'di las yongs su shes par bya'o //
translated: The irreversible bodhisattva mahāsattvas should also be known from this.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya ste /
translated: In that way, it should be known that bodhisattva mahāsattvas are not separated from the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor /
translated: Venerable Subhūti,

original: nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o // gzung bar bya'o //

original: bcang bar bya'o //🔽bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: bcang bar bya'o // bklag par bya'o //

analyzed: yongs su chub par bya'o //

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o; ;gzung bar bya'o //

original: bcang bar bya'o //🔽bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: bcang bar bya'o // bklag par bya'o //

original: yongs su chub par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su chub par bya'o //
translated: they should master it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
translated: and they should properly pay attention to it.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob @171b par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o //🔽gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob @171b par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan du mnyan par bya'o // gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings who wish to train in the bodhisattva levels and the buddhabhūmi should also listen to this perfection of wisdom,🔽they should take it up,

original: bcang bar bya'o //🔽bklag par bya'o //
analyzed: bcang bar bya'o // bklag par bya'o //
translated: they should bear it in mind,🔽they should read it aloud,

original: yongs su chub par bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su chub par bya'o //
translated: they should master it,

original: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o //
translated: and they should properly pay attention to it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos dang; rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos dang; rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to //
translated: In this perfection of wisdom the three vehicles are revealed in detail, in which the bodhisattva great beings, the śrāvakas, and the pratyekabuddhas should constantly and always train.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bzhi pa'o ////
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bzhi pa'o ////
translated: This was the fourth chapter, “The Perfection of Wisdom,” from the Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-Five Thousand Lines.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /

original: bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /
analyzed: bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of mindfulness of the Buddha,🔽mindfulness of the Dharma,🔽mindfulness of the Saṅgha,

original: skyo ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: skyo ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: mindfulness of morality,🔽mindfulness of giving,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: mindfulness of the gods,🔽mindfulness of the aspects of the body,🔽mindfulness of weariness,🔽mindfulness of death,

original: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /🔽yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs / yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: or mindfulness of inhalation and exhalation.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gis mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: bdag gis mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the five eyes, the six superknowledges, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
translated: Blessed One, if I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par @176a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par @176a *//
translated: what is it that I should designate with the term ‘bodhisattva’?

original: bgyi / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bgyi / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: that term does not stand,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: it does not reach,

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te /
translated: and it is not empowered.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽ming de ma mchis pas /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / ming de ma mchis pas /
translated: If you ask why,🔽it is because that term does not exist.

original: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: In that case, that term does not stand,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: it does not reach,🔽and it is not empowered.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so //
translated: there is no consecration.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dben pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dben pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the five appropriated aggregates, which are like a dream.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: Blessed One, I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of what is isolated.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the five appropriated aggregates, which are like an illusion, a mirage, an echo, an optical illusion, a reflection of the moon in water, a hallucination, or a magical creation.

original: zhi ba dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /🔽yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: zhi ba dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs / yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis chos kyi dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: the expanse of no purity, the expanse of no increase, and the expanse of no decrease.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: “Lord, I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the limit of reality,🔽the expanse of reality, the expanse of phenomena,🔽the expanse of what is, the expanse of what is not,🔽the expanse of no arising, the expanse of no birth, the expanse of no cessation,🔽the expanse of no affliction, the expanse of no purification, the expanse of no defilement,

original: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos @176b nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs /🔽yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos @176b nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs /🔽yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: the expanse of no purity, the expanse of no increase, and the expanse of no decrease.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of virtuous and nonvirtuous phenomena.

original: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /🔽yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs / yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of mundane and supramundane phenomena.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /🔽'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of phenomena with outflows and without outflows.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of phenomena of the past, future, and present.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bdag gis 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / ma 'ongs pa ma mchis pa dang / da ltar byung ba ma mchis pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend any increase or decrease of the past, future, or present.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /🔽de la ci zhes bgyi zhe na /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste / de la ci zhes bgyi zhe na /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the past, future, or present.

original: de ni 'dus ma bgyis te /🔽'dus ma bgyis ni 'das pa ma lags /
analyzed: de ni 'dus ma bgyis te / 'dus ma bgyis ni 'das pa ma lags /
translated: What is it that is called the unconditioned?🔽It is not the past,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma lags /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma lags /
translated: not the future,

original: da ltar byung ba ma lags so //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma lags so //
translated: and not the present.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis 'dus ma bgyis kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong @177a *//
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong @177a *//
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the unconditioned.

original: ste; 'dus ma bgyis de'ang gang zhe na /
analyzed: ste; 'dus ma bgyis de'ang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that unconditioned?

original: gang la skye ba ma mchis /
analyzed: gang la skye ba ma mchis /
translated: It is that in which there is no arising,

original: gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: no abiding,

original: 'jig pa ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig pa ma mchis pa ste /
translated: and no cessation.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /🔽byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bdag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa / byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the world systems of the eastern direction, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, together with their śrāvaka saṅghas and their bodhisattvas.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the world systems of the southern, western, and northern directions,🔽the intermediate directions, the nadir, and the zenith, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, together with their śrāvaka saṅghas and their bodhisattvas.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis lho dang nub dang byang dang / byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
translated: Blessed One,🔽I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas of the world systems of the southern, western, and northern directions,

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: the intermediate directions, the nadir, and the zenith, numerous as the sands of the River Ganges, together with their śrāvaka saṅghas and their bodhisattvas.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: I do not see them as real.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in that way I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease

original: de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
translated: of the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas together with their saṅgha of hearers,

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa rnams kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: and together with their bodhisattvas.🔽Blessed One,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /
translated: if I do not apprehend or see them,

original: byang chub sems dpa' @177b gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' @177b gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig btags par bstan par bgyi /
translated: To which perfection of wisdom should I give instructions and teachings?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: the name of the thus-gone one is not established,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: it has no end,

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis /
translated: and it is not blessed.

original: dge 'dun gyi ming de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi ming de dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: The name of the saṅgha and the name of the bodhisattva are not established,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: they have no end,🔽and they are not blessed.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te /
translated: there is no abiding, no meeting, and no blessing.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?🔽Because that name does not exist.

original: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: Thus, that name does not abide,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: does not meet,

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and is not blessed.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: Blessed One,

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of the suchness of all phenomena.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / de ltar bdag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /

analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du gdags par bgyi /

analyzed: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi ming de'ang gnas pa ma mchis /

analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis te /

analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: ming de ma mchis pas /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pas /

translated: In that case, that name does not endure,🔽it does not come to an end,

analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis so //
translated: and it is not empowered.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang yang 'di ltar 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de'ang phung @178a *//🔽po'am / khams sam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes chos kyi brdar bgyi ba dang / chos su gdags pa de'ang phung @178a *// po'am / khams sam /
translated: That which is called a bodhisattva, that which is called a dharma, and that which is designated as a dharma—none of that is described as anything from the aggregates,🔽the elements,

original: skye mched dam /
analyzed: skye mched dam /
translated: or the sense sources,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gang du'ang brjod du ma mchis te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gang du'ang brjod du ma mchis te /

original: chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so //
analyzed: chos su gdags pa tsam du bas so //
translated: It is merely designated as a dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The names ‘illusion,’ ‘echo,’ ‘optical illusion,’ ‘mirage,’ ‘moon in the water,’ and ‘tathāgata emanation’ are not described by anyone.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so; ;sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so; ;sa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: For example, the name ‘space’ is not expressed by anything. The name ‘earth’ is not expressed by anything.

original: chu dang / me dang / rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: chu dang / me dang / rlung zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The names ‘water,’ ‘fire,’ and ‘wind’ are not expressed by anything.

original: de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ces bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name ‘suchness’ is not expressed by anything.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang; yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang; yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The names ‘unmistaken suchness,’ ‘unchanging suchness,’ ‘the true nature of dharmas,’ ‘the dharma-constituent,’ ‘the establishment of dharmas,’ ‘the certification of dharmas,’ ‘the very limit of reality,’ and ‘the reality limit’ are not expressed by anything.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name ‘perfection of giving’ is not expressed by anything.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni @178b gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni @178b gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: tshul khrims zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name ‘morality’ is not something that can be expressed.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The names ‘meditative stabilization,’ ‘wisdom,’ ‘liberation,’ and ‘knowledge and seeing of liberation’ are not something that can be expressed.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name ‘stream enterer’ is not something that can be expressed.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name ‘dharmas of a stream enterer’ is not something that can be expressed.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: the name of a non-returner, and the name of a worthy one cannot be expressed by anything.

original: dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name of the Dharma of a worthy one cannot be expressed by anything.

original: rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name of a pratyekabuddha cannot be expressed by anything.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name of the Dharma of a pratyekabuddha cannot be expressed by anything.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so //
translated: The name of a bodhisattva cannot be expressed by anything.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so; ;yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis so; ;yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te /
translated: The name of the Dharma of a bodhisattva cannot be expressed by anything. The name of a perfect buddha cannot be expressed by anything.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming de'ang dge ba'am /🔽mi dge ba'am /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes bgyi ba'i ming de'ang dge ba'am / mi dge ba'am /
translated: The name “dharma of the perfect Buddha” is neither virtuous nor nonvirtuous.

original: kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'am /
analyzed: kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa'am /
translated: The name ‘qualities of a perfect buddha’ is not something that can be expressed by anything at all, whether it is wholesome or unwholesome,

original: kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa'am /
translated: whether it is reprehensible or irreproachable,

original: rtag pa'am / mi rtag pa'am /
analyzed: rtag pa'am / mi rtag pa'am /
translated: whether it is permanent or impermanent,

original: bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
analyzed: bde ba'am / sdug bsngal ba'am /
translated: whether it is happiness or suffering,

original: bdag gam / bdag ma mchis pa'am //🔽@179a *// zhi ba'am /
analyzed: bdag gam / bdag ma mchis pa'am // @179a *// zhi ba'am /
translated: whether it is a self or not a self,

original: ma zhi ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi ba'am /
translated: whether it is peace or not peace,

original: dben pa'am / mi dben pa'am /
analyzed: dben pa'am / mi dben pa'am /
translated: whether it is isolated or not isolated,

original: dngos po'am / dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pas /
analyzed: dngos po'am / dngos po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pas /
translated: or whether it is a thing or not a thing.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du /
analyzed: bdag gis don gyi dbang de lta bu mthong ba'i slad du /
translated: because I see this kind of significance,

original: de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
analyzed: de skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma dmigs /
translated: I do not apprehend or see the increase or decrease of any phenomena.

original: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste /
translated: Even though I do not apprehend or see anything,

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'am /
translated: I still say things like ‘bodhisattva’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming du gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ro zhes gsol to //
translated: I would be regretful if I were to designate the designation ‘perfection of wisdom.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: de ltar ming de ni gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: that designation is not a basis,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: not a limit,

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa ste /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa ste /
translated: and not a blessing.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: If one were to ask why,

original: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
analyzed: ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis /
translated: it is because that designation does not exist.🔽In that way, that designation is not a basis,

original: thug pa ma mchis /
analyzed: thug pa ma mchis /
translated: not a limit,

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ma mchis pa'o //
translated: and not a blessing.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de /
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod de /
translated: in that way, the perfection of wisdom is taught to bodhisattva great beings.

original: rnam pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di dag dang / tshul 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag gis bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: When it is taught with these aspects, this method, and these signs,

original: sems zhum par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sems zhum par mi 'gyur /
translated: their minds do not become downcast,

original: yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: do not become utterly downcast,

original: 'gyod pa ma mchis la /🔽mi 'jigs / mi dngangs shing /
analyzed: 'gyod pa ma mchis la / mi 'jigs / mi dngangs shing /
translated: and they do not have regrets.🔽They are not frightened, terrified,

original: skrag par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: skrag par mi 'gyur na /
translated: or seized with panic.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs par bgyi ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rtogs par bgyi ste /
translated: “Blessed One, one should understand that a bodhisattva great being who has such an understanding is definitely abiding on the bodhisattva’s irreversible ground.

original: @179b gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni /
analyzed: @179b gnas pa zhes bgyi ba ni /
translated: ‘Abiding’ means

original: gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul lo //
analyzed: gnas pa ma mchis pa'i tshul lo //
translated: the way of non-abiding.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: further, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not abide in form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and they should not abide in feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in the eyes,

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and they should not abide in the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in forms,

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and they should not abide in sounds, smells, tastes, textures, or mental phenomena.

original: des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not abide in the eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the ear-, nose-, tongue-, body-, or thinking-consciousnesses.

original: des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in eye-contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in ear-, nose-, tongue-, body-, or mind-contact.

original: des mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of eye-contact.

original: des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par @180a *//
analyzed: des rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par @180a *//
translated: nor in the conditioning factor of the thinking-mind sense-field and thoughts.

original: mi bgyi'o // des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: mi bgyi'o // des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in the earth element,🔽nor in the water element, nor in the fire element, nor in the wind element, nor in the space element, nor in the consciousness element.🔽He should not stand in ignorance,🔽nor in the formative predispositions,

original: nges chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: nges chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: nor in consciousness,🔽nor in name and form,🔽nor in the six sense fields,🔽nor in contact,🔽nor in sensation,🔽nor in craving,🔽nor in grasping,🔽nor in rebirth,🔽nor in birth,🔽nor in old age and death.

original: des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: He should not stand in suffering,🔽nor in its origin,🔽nor in its cessation,🔽nor in the path.🔽He should not stand in the fruit of a Streamwinner,🔽nor in the fruit of a Once-Returner,🔽nor in the fruit of a Non-Returner,🔽nor in the fruit of an Arhat,🔽nor in the fruit of a Rhinoceros-like Solitary Buddha,🔽nor in the fruit of a Perfectly Awakened One.
